rules.name: CPE_COE_Establishing_DPI_CPE_Account
rules.label: CPE COE = Establishing DPI CPE Account

rules.name: Network_COE_Stage_DPI_Orders_in_Progress
rules.label: Network COE Stage = DPI Orders in Progress

rules.name: Network_COE_Stage_DPI_Order_Completed
rules.label: Network COE Stage = DPI Order Completed

rules.name: Network_COE_Stage_Pending_First_Bill_Review
rules.label: Network COE Stage = Pending First Bill Review

rules.name: Network_COE_Stage_Bill_First_Reviewed
rules.label: Network COE Stage = Bill First Reviewed

formulas.name: CPECOE_Stage_Value
formulas.expression:
Case({!vCPECOE_Stage},
"Audit Review", 1, "Ordering CPE Equipment", 2, "Establishing DPI CPE Account", 3, "Add to WIP", 4, "Waiting on COC/COA", 5, "CPE Order Billed", 6, "CPE COE Completed", 7,0 )

formulas.name: DCS_Lock
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 0 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 0 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 1 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 2 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 3 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 1 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 2 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 3 ),
AND( {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 4 ),
AND( {!VTRANS_Stage_Value} = 4, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 3 ) )

formulas.name: DCS_Stage_Value
formulas.expression:
Case({!vCPEDCS_Stage},
"Review Order", 1, "Schedule CDC Call", 2, "Revised CDC Uploaded", 3, "Internal Call Scheduled", 4, "Internal Call Completed", 5, "Welcome Email Sent", 6, "CPE DCS Completed", 7,0 )

formulas.name: Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value
formulas.expression:
Case({!vHOTCUT_Stage},
"Review Order", 1, "Revised CDC Uploaded", 2, "Checklist in Progress", 3, "Checklist Completed", 4, "Schedule Migration Call", 5, "Migration Completed", 6, "HOTCUT Completed", 7,0 )

formulas.name: HOTCUT_Lock
formulas.expression:
OR( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 0,
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 1, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 1 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 2, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 1 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 3, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 4 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 4, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 3 ),
AND( {!DCS_Stage_Value} = 4, {!Hot_Cuts_Stage_Value} = 4 ) )

formulas.name: NetworkCOE_Stage_Value
formulas.expression:
Case({!vSimplyBB_Stage},
"Review Order", 1, "DPI Orders in Progress", 2, "DPI Order Completed", 3, "Pending First Bill Review", 4, "Bill First Reviewed", 5, "Simply BB Completed", 6,0 )

formulas.name: VTRANS_Stage_Value
formulas.expression:
Case({!vVTrans_Stage},
"Review Order", 1, "Translations In Progress", 2, "Translation Complete", 3, "Final CDC Uploaded", 4, "VTRANS Completed", 5,0 )
